text: By the Dawn's Early Light and similar phrases could refer to: *"...By the Dawn's Early Light...", a phrase from the national anthem of the United States, "The Star-Spangled Banner" *By Dawn's Early Light, a 1990 cable television film directed by Jack Sholder *"By Dawn's Early Light", a 1974 episode of the American television series Columbo *By the Dawn's Early Light, a 1991 album by Harold Budd *The Dawn's Early Light, a 1972 book by Walter Lord
title: By the Dawn's Early Light (disambiguation)
